categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Mama Scope was a human female sniper who inhabited the Anoat sector. She was considering a formidable leader, and one of the Rebels who served the longest in the sector.
Mama Scope joined the Smuggler's crew and participated in various missions.
Mama Scope was created by Kabam for Star Wars: Uprising, a canon video game for iOS and Android devices.
